programme.title: Lady Cocoa
programme.desc: Thugs try to kill a woman (Lola Falana) released from prison before she can testify against her boyfriend.

programme.title: TNT Jackson
programme.desc: A woman (Jeanne Bell) encounters thugs and drug dealers after traveling to Hong Kong to search for her missing brother.

programme.title: Action Jackson
programme.desc: An Ivy League Detroit policeman (Carl Weathers) steals an auto tycoon's (Craig T. Nelson) mistress (Vanity) and stops his gang of assassins.

programme.title: Hurricane Smith
programme.desc: An American's (Carl Weathers) search for his sister leads to foul play and a brothel on the coast of Australia.

programme.title: Dolemite
programme.desc: A wrongly jailed man (Rudy Ray Moore) and his female kung-fu friends seek vengeance on the rival (D'Urville Martin) who put him away.

programme.title: The Human Tornado
programme.desc: A fat rhymer (Rudy Ray Moore) flees to California, where he helps a madam (Lady Reed) and her female fighters battle a local gangster.

programme.title: Rudy Ray Moore: Rude
programme.desc: Blaxploitation legend Rudy Ray Moore performs routines from his comedy albums and skewers racial stereotypes, pimps and more.

programme.title: Disco Godfather
programme.desc: A nightclub owner (Rudy Ray Moore) declares war on drug dealers after his nephew has a bad trip on angel dust.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Al Green sings "Let's Stay Together"; author Verta Mae Grosvenor reads form her latest book, "Thursdays and Every Other Sunday Off."

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Merry Clayton; the Reverend Jesse Jackson talks with host Ellis Haizlip about his newly formed organization, People United to Save Humanity (PUSH).

programme.title: Soul!
programme.desc: Author Chester Himes is welcomed back from self-exile in Europe; actor Al Freeman Jr. reads from Himes' autobiography; The Dells.

programme.title: Soul!
programme.sub-title: Harry Belafonte; Novella Nelson; Sidney Poitier
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Harry Belafonte discuss their new film, "Buck and the Preacher"; Novella Nelson.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: Coming To Soul Flix... Dolemite, Down and Dirty, The Twilight People, The Harder They Come and others.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A white homesteader's black blood brother is sent to negotiate the release of their families from their Indian captors.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: In 1860s Texas, a man whose abused wife fell in love with a Kiowa organizes a hunting party to recapture her.

programme.title: The Borrower
programme.desc: The police (Rae Dawn Chong, Don Gordon) follow the work of an alien who borrows and then sheds human heads.

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mobsters send a man to collect from a Hollywood filmmaker who owes them money.

programme.title: Uptown Saturday Night
programme.desc: Blue-collar buddies (Sidney Poitier, Bill Cosby) search the underworld for a winning lottery ticket lost in a nightclub holdup.
